abstract: Interview with billionaire William I Koch, who describes what led him to fire head of Oxbridge Academy of Palm Beaches and to decline to renew contracts of school's athletic director and football coach; internal investigation into school revealed wild misspending of funds by administration and number of other violations, including accusations of sexual harassment and grade-changing.
lead_paragraph: An internal inquiry at Oxbridge Academy in West Palm Beach led William I. Koch to oust the school’s top executive, athletic director and football coach.

headline.main: Upheaval Amid ‘Alarming’ Revelations at William Koch’s Florida School
headline.print_headline: ‘Alarming’ Revelations of Misspent Money at a Koch Brother’s School in Florida

snippet: An internal inquiry at Oxbridge Academy in West Palm Beach led William I. Koch to oust the school’s top executive, athletic director and football coach.
